from 0

A/ 053.2
053
5*8^1 + 3*8^0 = 40 + 3 = 43

00.2
2*8^-1 = 0.25

43.25

B/ 0100.66
0100
1*8^2 + 0*8^1 + 0*8^0 = 64

00.66
6*8^-1 + 6*8^-2 = 0.75 + 0.093 = 0.843

64.843

C/ 0151.4
0151
1*8^2 + 5*8^1 + 1*8^0 = 64 + 40 + 1 = 105

00.4
4*8^-1 = 0.5

105.5

D/ 023.74
023
2*8^1 + 3*8^0 = 16 + 3 = 19

00.74
7*8^-1 + 4*8^-2 = 0.937

19.937
